Utility.name: Degrading Tools
Utility.description:
Changes the textures of the Swords, Pickaxes, Axes, Shovels and Hoes of all materials, as well as those of the Bow, Flint and Steel and Shears to display wearing with degrading durability. The increments at which the degradation will show are 0-70%, 71-80%, 81-90% and 91-100%.

requiresefr

incompat{Comprehensive Tool Upgrade}

Utility.name: Comprehensive Tool Upgrade
Utility.description:
Changes the textures of all tools. All tools receive a shiny finish and adhere to the color palettes of their components. Additionally, through the use of a mix of CIT functionality and the recipe manipulation techniques in MineTweaker, this Addon supports a wide variety of alternative tool types.
Wooden Tools now not just come as wooden tools, but also as tools of every single wood type, should you choose to craft a tool with only planks of that specific wood type. For tools crafted from multiple different planks, the standard Wooden Tools texture will be used.
Stone Tools now can be crafted from Cobblestone and Flint.
Bows can be crafted as Recurve Bows.
Arrows (the item and the design displayed in the 'Pulled Bow' texture, aswell as the Arrow entity) and Spectral Arrows have also received an upgrade, making them use darker tips, more akin to Flint, than Iron.
Additionally, there are now a variety of different tool types that differ from the standard ones:
Swords can also display as Battlestaves, Daggers and Sabers.
Axes can also display as Waraxes.
All tools also degrade with use.

⚠️ Careful: All of these features are purely visual in nature! There are no differences between the wood types!

incompat{Degrading Tools}

attscript
